summary: The eleven year old cycling talent Freddy is the son of a butcher in an idyllic village in no man's land. His isolated life is turned upside down completely in 1975 when the first ... See full summary »
cast: Jelte Blommaert|Peter Van den Begin|Barbara Sarafian|Mathias Vergels|Lotte Bode|Silke Cnockaert|Stefaan Degand|Bruno Georis|Coline Leempoel|Frieda Pittoors|Bruno Vereeck|Jelle Cleymans|Antje Boermans|Julian Borsani|Ben Van den Heuvel|Jelle Florizoone|Dayo Clinckspoor|Luk D'Heu|Jo De Caluwé|Celestes de Vlam|Vic de Wachter|David Dermez|Filip Destoop|Frank Dierens|Megan Gadé|Servé Hermans|Emma Landman|Briek Lesage|Felix Maesschalck|Jef Manderveld|Rose Meyer|Emma Pelckmans|Lotte Pinoy|Hervé Sogne|Waldemar Torenstra|Mark Uytterhoeven|Joni Van Swalm|Kasper Vanbeginne|Pieter Vanhaute|Mark Vanlombeek|Michael Vergauwen|Brecht Vermeersch
title: Allez, Eddy!
